body.name: ELIVED Ultra Slim Tilt TV Wall Mount for Most 37-80 Inch TVs, 0.8" Low Profile TV Mount, Wall Mount TV Brackets Max VESA 600x400, Holds Up to 99 lbs. Fits 8" 16" 24" Wood Studs.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 23 mins
features: Universal TV Mount - This Ultra Slim Tilt TV mount fits most 37-80 inch TVs with VESA patterns range from 100x100mm(4x4”) to 600x400mm(24x16”) and holds up to 99 lbs./45kg. Please CHECK TV weight, size, VESA, and input access before purchase.
Low Profile Wall Mount for TV: Narrow gap 0.8" between TV and wall plate of this low profile TV mount. Low profile design make this wall mount combine with your TV naturally, saving space perfectly.
Quick release & Lock: Pull lock and release design helps you release the mount bracket from TV easily. No need to look back of the TV, the strap solves everything.

Easy and Quick Installation - Our tilt TV Mount is easy to install and comes with a clear step-by-step installation instruction, bubble level, and necessary standard mounting kit. The concrete wall anchors will be sent per request(Please contact us through your order if you need). NOTE: DO NOT install into drywall alone.
Efficient Customer Service - Our professional support team is available to answer your pre-purchase and installation questions at any time.
body.description: ELIVED TILTING TV WALL MOUNT FOR 37" - 80" TVS NOTE: Must Check Before Purchase 1. VESA (Four screw holes on the back of the TV/ Horizontal x Vertical) Min VESA: 100x100mm/4x4" Max VESA: 600x400mm/24x16" 2. TV Specs Size: 37"-80" Weight: up to 99 lbs./45kg 3. Wall Type (DO NOT install into drywall alone.) Wood studs: 8"-24' Concrete wall: Anchor is needed. (Concrete wall anchors will be shipped directly per request.) Package Includes: 1x TV wall mount, 1x Bubble level, 3x Cable ties, 1x Installation manual, 1x Standard mounting hardware

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's sturdy, easy to install, and provides a great viewing experience.
reviews.reviewText: I recently decided to mount my 65" TV in my bedroom and chose this ultra-slim tilt TV wall mount for the job. It's been a great addition to my space, combining functionality with a sleek design.The first thing I noticed about this mount is its low profile. Once installed, there's only a 0.8" gap between the TV and the wall, which gives it a clean, almost seamless look. This design is perfect for anyone who appreciates a minimalist aesthetic or simply wants to save space.The installation process was more straightforward than I expected. Although you'll need your own tools, the mount comes with all the necessary hardware and a clear set of instructions. The inclusion of a bubble level in the kit was a thoughtful touch, ensuring that I got the TV perfectly level on the first try.The mount's compatibility with a range of TV sizes and VESA patterns is a big plus. It's reassuring to know that it can securely hold TVs up to 80 inches and 99 lbs. The quick release and lock feature is another highlight. It’s designed to easily attach and detach the TV from the mount, a convenient feature for when you need to access ports on the back of the TV.As for the tilt function, it provides just enough adjustability for an optimal viewing angle, especially useful in a bedroom setting where you might be viewing from different positions.In summary, this TV wall mount is a solid choice for anyone looking to mount their TV with a sleek, space-saving design. It's sturdy, easy to install, and provides a great viewing experience. Definitely a worthwhile investment for a more streamlined and modern look in any room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Flush Wall Mount
reviews.reviewText: This ELIVED TV mount allows for a nice flush mount to your wall for 26 - 80 inch TVs. The mounting uses the standard VESA patterns range from 4”x4” to 24”x16” and holds up to 99 lbs. This mount should work for any TV that fits those size requirements - we had no issues with it mounting to our Samsung TV. We especially like the fact that this mount keeps the TV extremely close to the wall, however still allowing for some tilt adjustment. If you are wanting more tilt, mount the bracket lower on the holes so when tilted the bottom of the TV does not hit the wall as soon. The bracket is well made, with many different hole options to fit your mounting application. Directs are adequate for a first-timer to understand.This is a nice mount that gives a very flush wall mount.
